channel.title: Latest from Android Central

item.title: I get the best sound quality out of my Sony headphones and earbuds by changing this setting
item.description: Sony's LDAC codec enables hi-res audio on Android phones, but you need to download the Sound Connect companion app and change this setting to use it.

item.dc:creator: Brady Snyder
